title: "TotalBiscuit's Widow Weighs Deleting His YouTube Videos To Save Them From AI"
excerpt: "Genna Bain, whose late husband was the game critic and YouTube personality John “Totalbiscuit” Bain, broke the news to fans that she’s contemplating removing all of his videos from the internet to prevent “AI” machine-learning technologies from storing and manipulating his voice to promote particular political and social views."
